required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Registrational Study With Omecamtiv Mecarbil/AMG 423 to Treat Chronic Heart Failure With Reduced Ejection Fraction
clinical_study.official_title: A Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled, Multicenter Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Omecamtiv Mecarbil on Mortality and Morbidity in Subjects With Chronic Heart Failure With Reduced Ejection Fraction (GALACTIC-HF)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine if treatment with omecamtiv mecarbil/AMG 423 when added to standard of care is well tolerated and superior to placebo in reducing the risk of cardiovascular death or heart failure events in subjects with chronic HFrEF.

primary_outcome.measure: Measure time to cardiovascular death or first heart failure event
primary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, up to 208 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Evaluate the effect of omecamtiv mecarbil/AMG 423 as compared with placebo in subjects with chronic heart failure with reduced ejection fraction receiving standard of care therapy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, up to 208 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate effects of omecamtiv mecarbil/AMG 423 on time to cardiovascular death

secondary_outcome.measure: Measure changes in patient reported outcomes Kansas City Cardiomyopathy Questionnaire Total Symptom Score
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate effect of treatment with omecamtiv mecarbil/AMG 423 on changes in patient reported outcomes

secondary_outcome.measure: Measure time to first heart failure hospitalization
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, up to 208 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate effects of omecamtiv mecarbil/AMG 423 to first heart failure hospitalization

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, up to 208 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate effects of omecamtiv mecarbil/AMG 423 to all-cause death

other_outcome.measure: Subject incidence of reported adverse events
other_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, up to 208 weeks

other_outcome.measure: Subject incidence of reported serious adverse events of ventricular arrhythmias requiring treatment
other_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, up to 208 weeks

other_outcome.measure: Subject incidence of positively adjudicated major cardiac ischemic events
other_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, up to 208 weeks
other_outcome.description: Positively adjudicated major cardiac ischemic adverse events are: myocardial infarction, hospitalization for unstable angina, percutaneous coronary intervention/coronary artery bypass graft

arm_group.description: Oral omecamtiv mecarbil twice daily for up to 208 weeks
Oral placebo twice daily for up to 208 weeks

intervention.description: Oral omecamtiv mecarbil twice daily for up to 208 weeks with dose level determined by periodic blood testing
Oral placebo twice daily for up to 208 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Key Inclusion Criteria:
- Subject has provided informed consent
- Male or female, ≥ 18 to ≤ 85 years
- History of chronic HF (defined as requiring treatment for HF for a minimum of 30 days before randomization)
- LVEF ≤ 35%, per subjects most recent medical record, within 12 months prior to screening.
- NYHA class II to IV at most recent screening assessment.
- Managed with HF SoC therapies consistent with regional clinical practice guidelines according to investigator judgment of subject's clinical status
- Current hospitalization with primary reason of HF OR one of the following events within 1 year of screening: hospitalization with primary reason of HF; urgent visit to emergency department (ED) with primary reason of HF.
- Elevated BNP or NT-proBNP
Other Inclusion Criteria May apply
Key Exclusion Criteria:
- Currently receiving treatment in another investigational device or drug study, or < 30 days since ending treatment on another investigational device or drug study(ies). Other investigational procedures while participating in this study are excluded.
- Malignancy within 5 years prior to randomization with the following exceptions: localized basal or squamous cell carcinoma of the skin, cervical intraepithelial neoplasia, stage 1 prostate carcinoma, breast ductal carcinoma in situ.
- Subject has known sensitivity to any of the products or components to be administered during testing
Other Exclusion Criteria May apply
